com.bassintag.tekengine.object.game

Class TekGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bassintag.tekengine.object.TekObject
      • com.bassintag.tekengine.object.game.TekGame

  • public abstract class TekGame
extends TekObject
    TekGame.java created for TekEngine Represents a game that can be loaded by the engine
    Since:
    01/12/2016
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Antoine
